mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( product_id, facility_id, product_name, management_type, stock, price, product_images, size ) VALUES (#{product_id}, #{facility_id}, #{product_name}, #{management_type}, #{stock}, #{price}, #{product_images}, #{size} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.facility_id, p.product_name, p.price, p.stock, p.size, p.product_images, f.facility_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN facility f ON p.facility_id = f.facility_id ORDER BY p.product_id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_name = #{product_name}, price = #{price}, facility_id = #{facility_id} WHERE product_id = #{product_id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.facility_id, p.product_name, p.price, p.stock, p.size, p.product_images, f.facility_name, pa.origin_path, pa.thumbnail_path, pa.file_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN facility f ON p.facility_id = f.facility_id LEFT JOIN product_attach pa ON p.product_id = pa.product_id WHERE p.product_id = #{product_id}
select * from product p join product_attach pa on pa.product_id = p.product_id;
